segments.text: So do you think you can get to the office alone ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure , I ’ ll catch the train . If I can ’ t catch the train , I ’ ll get a taxi .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you think the taxi driver will understand you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: If he doesn ’ t understand me , I ’ ll show him the office address on my business card .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Ok but how will we know if you are going to be late ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I ’ ll call you if I ’ m delayed .
segments.speaker: S2
